content.question: Which of the following will increase the market supply for new automobiles?

choices.label: An increase in the price of steel, an input in the production of automobiles
An increase in taxes on automobile manufacturers
An increase in subsidies to automobile manufacturers
An increase in the price of gasoline, a complementary good

content.answer: An increase in subsidies to automobile manufacturers

skill.text: Skill 2.A: Using economic concepts, principles, or models, explain how a specific economic outcome occurs, or what action should be taken in order to achieve a specific economic outcome.
